snippet: The Microsoft co-founder has started a fund to invest in energy research to reduce the causes of climate change, work that would build on efforts that may be threatened by a Trump administration....
abstract: Bill Gates launches Breakthrough Energy Ventures, investment fund for clean and sustainable energy development, sector expecting to lose government support under Trump administration; fund will capitalize on government-backed research through partnerships with University of California and others institutions.

byline.original: By HIROKO TABUCHI and HENRY FOUNTAIN

lead_paragraph: The Microsoft co-founder has started a fund to invest in energy research to reduce the causes of climate change, work that would build on efforts that may be threatened by a Trump administration.

headline.main: Bill Gates Leads New Fund as Fears of U.S. Retreat on Climate Grow
headline.print_headline: Bill Gates Leads New Fund as Fears of U.S. Retreat on Climate Grow
